businessProfile.name: Pizzeria Limone
businessProfile.address: 422 W Rivers Edge Dr, Provo, UT 84604, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 422 W Rivers Edge Dr, Provo, UT 84604, USA

reviews.text: I had a great experience here today. This restaurant offers a great product at a reasonable price. They also have plenty of items on their menu to choose from. The service was excellent. The staff is friendly and accommodating. Overall, this restaurant is worth trying.

I wish I could give more stars!! I‚Äôve been a long time fan of pizzeria limone and was so excited for it to come to Provo! Our experience was great - the pizzas were delicious and perfectly baked. It was super clean and a good atmosphere. We will definitely be coming back!

Phenomenal! I'd only been to the Pizzaria Limone in the Salt Lake airport and had a good experience there, but this WAY exceeded my expectations and what I remembered.
Good pricing, super fast, and really great options for both typical and more exploratory pizzas. We got the Pera (with pear) and Viola (with blackberries) and both were phenomenal. I guess I was so excited about them that I forgot to take a picture of the pear one üòÖ
We also got a pear lemonade which was really good and they gave us a lemon-ice-and-ice-cream (not sure the name) since they wanted to share that item with new customers.
Excited to go back and try the rest of the menu, I see this place very easily becoming a mainstay in Provo.

So, this was my first time at this location. I know the pizza cooks fast, so when I got in my car to drive, I attempted to phone an order in, and was told they don‚Äôt take phone orders. Only online, but which has a $1.50 service fee for orders under $25.00 and Provo doesn‚Äôt have a link to online order from. As I told the kind person who answered the phone, that‚Äôs a bad customer experience, as is reflected by my rating. My suggestions, drop the dollar 50 service charge for orders under $25, and allow orders to be done over the phone. Or even better via text message.
Nice place, good pizza. Pizza got served pretty fast. Crust and toppings ratio was pretty good.

recentReviews.text: I had a great experience here today. This restaurant offers a great product at a reasonable price. They also have plenty of items on their menu to choose from. The service was excellent. The staff is friendly and accommodating. Overall, this restaurant is worth trying.
Margarita pizza was a dead ringer for a bagel bite. How is this place in business?
This location sucks every time I‚Äôve ordered from it. NEVER ordering from here again. I don‚Äôt know why you think it‚Äôs acceptable to sell a divino with BURNT chocolate.

El servicio fue excelente. El chico me recomend√≥ las pizzas que no aparecian en el menu. Fue amable y me encant√≥ mi eleccion. Pizza burrata. Senti el viaje a italia sob montarme en el avion. Este lugar es muy buena opci√≥n.

ABDEL IS THE BEST EMPLOYEE!!!! He made sure my experience was beyond pleasant. I will be coming here for my birthday, my moms birthday, and well maybe my wedding night. Give him a raise, he deserves it.

This place made me sick to my stomach with its food but the service and people working there were amazing people. The atmosphere is very chill and relaxed but also kind of boring because of that. The restroom was my safe haven during my dinner trip here.

detailedReviews.author: daniel fullmer
detailedReviews.text: I had a great experience here today. This restaurant offers a great product at a reasonable price. They also have plenty of items on their menu to choose from. The service was excellent. The staff is friendly and accommodating. Overall, this restaurant is worth trying.

detailedReviews.author: Josiah Fee
detailedReviews.text: Margarita pizza was a dead ringer for a bagel bite. How is this place in business?

detailedReviews.author: Mason Pond
detailedReviews.text: Excellent and very speedy food

detailedReviews.author: Alyssa Baird
detailedReviews.text: This location sucks every time I‚Äôve ordered from it. NEVER ordering from here again. I don‚Äôt know why you think it‚Äôs acceptable to sell a divino with BURNT chocolate.

detailedReviews.author: A. M.
detailedReviews.text: El servicio fue excelente. El chico me recomend√≥ las pizzas que no aparecian en el menu. Fue amable y me encant√≥ mi eleccion. Pizza burrata. Senti el viaje a italia sob montarme en el avion. Este lugar es muy buena opci√≥n.

detailedReviews.author: bria mccormick
detailedReviews.text: ABDEL IS THE BEST EMPLOYEE!!!! He made sure my experience was beyond pleasant. I will be coming here for my birthday, my moms birthday, and well maybe my wedding night. Give him a raise, he deserves it.

detailedReviews.author: Alyssa Freeman
detailedReviews.text: Abdel was so helpful!

detailedReviews.author: Jared F Sine
detailedReviews.text: This place made me sick to my stomach with its food but the service and people working there were amazing people. The atmosphere is very chill and relaxed but also kind of boring because of that. The restroom was my safe haven during my dinner trip here.

detailedReviews.author: Tai Gibson
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town!!! Seriously the cleanest, restaurant with the best pizza I‚Äôve had in a while. You NEED to try their lemonades and ice cream slushy dessert too. They‚Äôre to die for and perfect for the summer heat. 10000/10 recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Hunter
detailedReviews.text: So, this was my first time at this location. I know the pizza cooks fast, so when I got in my car to drive, I attempted to phone an order in, and was told they don‚Äôt take phone orders. Only online, but which has a $1.50 service fee for orders under $25.00 and Provo doesn‚Äôt have a link to online order from. As I told the kind person who answered the phone, that‚Äôs a bad customer experience, as is reflected by my rating. My suggestions, drop the dollar 50 service charge for orders under $25, and allow orders to be done over the phone. Or even better via text message.

detailedReviews.author: Ryan V
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food; staff was super helpful.

detailedReviews.author: Angela Brown
detailedReviews.text: Food was okay. But not really worth going back for! Also, they have these random nights where they like to BLAST music outside so loud that every single resident in the apartments across the parking can hear every.single.word! Another reason I don‚Äôt plan to be a patron there again!!

detailedReviews.author: Marquelle Christensen
detailedReviews.text: Everything was SO fresh and yummy! Definitely gonna make this a regular stop!

detailedReviews.author: Erika Burdett
detailedReviews.text: I just died and went back to Italy! Best Pizza I‚Äôve had since I went to Europe. I‚Äôm almost remiss to give a review because once it gets out how good this place is, it will be PACKED! Got the Margherita Napoli pizza and the Perra. It had pears on it which I was wary of but it WORKED üòãALSO they give FREE SOFTSERVE CONES to kids under 10. Which my kids LOVED. I could go on about the lemonade but this review is long enough. Go eat there. Right now.

detailedReviews.author: andrew flores
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza. Very happy that they came to Provo. This location is awesome.

detailedReviews.author: Bango Jetty
detailedReviews.text: I don‚Äôt usually write reviews online, but Pizzeria Limone is worthy of it. Best pizza I‚Äôve had by far and both the atmosphere and service were fantastic!

detailedReviews.author: Anna Wolford
detailedReviews.text: I wish I could give more stars!! I‚Äôve been a long time fan of pizzeria limone and was so excited for it to come to Provo! Our experience was great - the pizzas were delicious and perfectly baked. It was super clean and a good atmosphere. We will definitely be coming back!

detailedReviews.author: Bryan Baird
detailedReviews.text: Nice place, good pizza. Pizza got served pretty fast. Crust and toppings ratio was pretty good.

detailedReviews.author: Mitch Stephenson
detailedReviews.text: This place is delicious and the service was great! They gave my whole family free ice cream.

detailedReviews.author: Tyler
detailedReviews.text: Glad Provo got a Pizzeria Limone! Very very good, favorite pizza around

detailedReviews.author: Provo Local Foodie
detailedReviews.text:
Phenomenal! I'd only been to the Pizzaria Limone in the Salt Lake airport and had a good experience there, but this WAY exceeded my expectations and what I remembered.
Good pricing, super fast, and really great options for both typical and more exploratory pizzas. We got the Pera (with pear) and Viola (with blackberries) and both were phenomenal. I guess I was so excited about them that I forgot to take a picture of the pear one üòÖ
We also got a pear lemonade which was really good and they gave us a lemon-ice-and-ice-cream (not sure the name) since they wanted to share that item with new customers.
Excited to go back and try the rest of the menu, I see this place very easily becoming a mainstay in Provo.

detailedReviews.author: Sarah trevino
detailedReviews.text: Really friendly staff, inside was really clean! Employees were on top of cleaning the tables, and the owner guy was super patient with us when deciding on what to get. 10/10 pizza, will definitely be coming back and recommending to friends!

detailedReviews.author: Chandler Chavis
detailedReviews.text: Pizzeria Limone Provo lives up to its five-star rating! Their wood-fired pizzas boast a perfectly blistered, chewy crust and fresh, flavorful toppings. We can‚Äôt get enough of the tangy Catania salad and indulgent, gooey cheese bread. Add in the cozy, modern dining room and attentive staff, and it‚Äôs a must-visit!

detailedReviews.author: Hannah Adams
detailedReviews.text: Excellent food and customer service! Meets the standards of other Pizzeria Limone locations I‚Äôve visited. Beautiful dining area with outdoor seating.

detailedReviews.author: Salvador Juan Sanchez
detailedReviews.text: Muy limpio el lugar, compr√© un calzone y estaba muy rico, y sus limonadas son muy refrescantes!!! Recomiendo el lugar üòã

detailedReviews.author: Satu Kujanp√§√§
detailedReviews.text: BLACKBERRY PIZZA! Sounds weird but try it! What a clean, happy place. Workers were so nice! Highly recommend. Beautiful atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Jenny Briggs West
detailedReviews.text: The KINDEST staff. Every interaction was genuine and kind. The pizza was heavenly and they provided excellent customer service. 10/10

detailedReviews.author: Pamela Barnes
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the county & their specialty salad & lemonades are to die forüéâ

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 34 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the authentic and delicious pizza that transports them back to Italy, making it a standout choice for pizza lovers. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The exceptional service provided by staff, particularly Abdel, creates memorable dining experiences that customers want to return for special occasions. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

The restaurant's clean and inviting atmosphere, combined with unique offerings like free soft-serve cones for kids, enhances the overall dining experience for families. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to food quality concerns (e.g., burnt chocolate, food making customers sick) - review management can address this concern
Poor customer experience with ordering process (e.g., inability to place phone orders, service fee for online orders under $25) - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness leading to a boring dining experience - social media marketing can improve this area
